#summary Install instruction for openSUSE users.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
=Add the repository=

OSDlyrics will be included in openSUSE 12.2, you can install it from OSS repository. And we will still provide community support. You can also add these community repository to install.

==openSUSE 12.1==
{{{
sudo zypper ar http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/opensuse_zh/openSUSE_12.1/ home:opensuse_zh
}}}

==openSUSE 11.4==
{{{
sudo zypper ar http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/opensuse_zh/openSUSE_11.4/ home:opensuse_zh
}}}

==openSUSE 11.3==
{{{
sudo zypper ar http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/opensuse_zh/openSUSE_11.3/ home:opensuse_zh
}}}

==openSUSE Factory==
{{{
sudo zypper ar http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/opensuse_zh/openSUSE_Factory/ home:opensuse_zh
}}}

==openSUSE Tumbleweed==
{{{
sudo zypper ar http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/opensuse_zh/openSUSE_Tumbleweed/ home:opensuse_zh
}}}

=Install OSD Lyrics=

After adding repository, you can use zypper to install it:
{{{
sudo zypper in osdlyrics
}}}

You can also search osdlyrics in http://software.opensuse.org and choose _Include users' home projects_ to 1-Click install it. The repository will be added into your system automaticly.
